Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dave Stieb (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/1985, off Bruce Hurst (BOS)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/1985, hitting .393 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...

Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 7/6/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/1986, hitting .611 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/1986, hitting .655 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 7/30/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1986, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
8/19/1986: Signed a contract extension with New York (Y), $8,260,000 per year, for 6 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1986, hitting .583 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Sets a new season AL-Record for Hits with 204 on 9/18/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1986, hitting .615 with 2 HR, 18 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1986, hitting .440 with 6 HR, 33 RBI...

Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1988...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/1989, hitting .625 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1989...
Injured on 4/3/1990 with a Ruptured Medial Collateral Ligament, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1991, hitting .429 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1991, hitting .327 with 10 HR, 32 RBI...
Traded from New York (Y) to New York (M) on 6/2/1991 (Going to NYM: 1B Don Mattingly. Going to NYY: P Jeff Innis, C Dave Nilsson, CF Mike Cameron)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against St. Louis on 7/9/1991...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1991...
7/26/1992: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $4,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
